questions.question: What best describes Samsung Protect Max?
options: A) A theft and loss insurance plan
C) A comprehensive protection plan with accidental & functional damage coverage
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: When does Samsung Protect Max coverage begin?
options: C) After 30 days cooling period from plan purchase
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: How many claims can a customer raise under Samsung Protect Max?
options: C) Limited claims based on invoice value
D) Unlimited claims during the tenure
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: Is there any invoice value capping under Samsung Protect Max?
options: A) Yes, capped at 50% of invoice value
D) Capping applies only for second claim

questions.question: Is depreciation applied on parts or repair costs?
options: A) Yes, as per device age
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: What does OTD (One Time Deductible) mean?
options: A) Deductible payable on every claim
B) Deductible paid only at policy purchase
C) A one-time amount paid every time before availing any damage claim
D) Deductible applicable only for accidental damage
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: Does Samsung Protect Max cover theft or loss of the device?
options: A) Yes, both theft and loss
D) No, theft and loss are not covered
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: Where can customers get repairs done under Samsung Protect Max?
options: C) Samsung brand-authorized service centers only

questions.question: Is Samsung Protect Max valid outside India?
options: A) No, only valid in India
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: Which statement about repair value is correct?
options: A) Total repair value is capped during tenure
B) Only one repair up to invoice value is allowed
C) Each claim is allowed up to invoice value with no cap on number of claims
D) Repair value reduces after every claim
questions.category: Samsung Protect Max – MT

questions.question: A customer has already raised two damage claims under Samsung Protect Max. Can they raise another claim?
options: A) No, maximum two claims are allowed

C) Yes, unlimited claims are allowed during tenure
D) Only after paying a second deductible

questions.question: A customer’s phone invoice value is ₹ 80,000. What is the maximum repair value allowed per claim?
